mapper.select: update nideshop_order set order_status=true and pay_status=true where id=#{orderId}
select * from nideshop_order where user_id=#{userId} order by id desc
mapper.sql: id, order_sn, user_id, order_status, shipping_status, pay_status, consignee, country, province, city, district, address, mobile, postscript, shipping_fee, pay_name, pay_id, actual_price, integral, integral_money, order_price, goods_price, add_time, confirm_time, pay_time, freight_price, coupon_id, parent_id, coupon_price, callback_status

distinct
from nideshop_order
order by ${orderByClause}
